data.title: Farsi and Dari factsheet
data.meta_description: Our Farsi and Dari factsheet helps understand the main differences between Dari and Farsi, and find useful information on Tajik and Pashto.
data.text:
View and download our Farsi and Dari factsheet to understand the main differences between Dari and Farsi, and get useful information on Tajik and Pashto.
